Commands.Description: This is a PowerShell Crescendo wrapper function for Robocopy or Robust File Copy for Windows

Parameters.Name: Source
Parameters.Description: Specify the source directory or file to be copied.

Parameters.Name: Destination
Parameters.Description: Specify the target directory or filename to be copied to.

Parameters.Name: Files
Parameters.Description: File(s) to copy  (names/wildcards: default is *.*).

Parameters.Name: Help
Parameters.Description: Produces help from the native command

Parameters.Name: SubDirectories
Parameters.Description: copy Subdirectories, but not empty ones.

Parameters.Name: AllDirectories
Parameters.Description: copy subdirectories, including Empty ones.

Parameters.Name: nLevels
Parameters.Description: only copy the top n LEVels of the source directory tree.

Parameters.Name: Restartable
Parameters.Description: copy files in restartable mode.

Parameters.Name: BackupMode
Parameters.Description: copy files in Backup mode.

Parameters.Name: RestartableBackup
Parameters.Description: use restartable mode; if access denied use Backup mode.

Parameters.Name: UnBuffered
Parameters.Description: copy using unbuffered I/O (recommended for large files).

Parameters.Name: EFSRAW
Parameters.Description: copy all encrypted files in EFS RAW mode.

Parameters.Name: CopyFlags
Parameters.Description:
what to COPY for files (default is /COPY:DAT). 
(copyflags : D=Data, A=Attributes, T=Timestamps, X=Skip alt data streams). 
(S=Security=NTFS ACLs, O=Owner info, U=aUditing info).

Parameters.Name: CopySEC
Parameters.Description: copy files with SECurity (equivalent to /COPY:DATS).

Parameters.Name: CopyALL
Parameters.Description: COPY ALL file info (equivalent to /COPY:DATSOU).

Parameters.Name: NoCopy
Parameters.Description: COPY NO file info (useful with /PURGE).

Parameters.Name: SECFix
Parameters.Description: FIX file SECurity on all files, even skipped files.

Parameters.Name: TimeFix
Parameters.Description: FIX file TIMes on all files, even skipped files.

Parameters.Name: Purge
Parameters.Description: delete dest files/dirs that no longer exist in source.

Parameters.Name: Mirror
Parameters.Description: MIRror a directory tree (equivalent to /E plus /PURGE).

Parameters.Name: MoveFiles
Parameters.Description: MOVe files (delete from source after copying).

Parameters.Name: MoveAll
Parameters.Description: MOVE files AND dirs (delete from source after copying).

Parameters.Name: AddAttributes
Parameters.Description:
Adds the specified attributes to copied files. The valid values for this option are: 
R - Read only 
A - Archive 
S - System 
H - Hidden 
C - Compressed 
N - Not content indexed 
E - Encrypted 
T - Temporary

Parameters.Name: RemoveAttributes
Parameters.Description:
Removes the specified attributes to copied files. The valid values for this option are: 
R - Read only 
A - Archive 
S - System 
H - Hidden 
C - Compressed 
N - Not content indexed 
E - Encrypted 
T - Temporary

Parameters.Name: CreateTree
Parameters.Description: CREATE directory tree and zero-length files only.

Parameters.Name: FAT
Parameters.Description: create destination files using 8.3 FAT file names only.
turn off very long path (> 256 characters) support.

Parameters.Name: MonitorChanges
Parameters.Description: MONitor source; run again when more than n changes seen.

Parameters.Name: MonitorTime
Parameters.Description: MOnitor source; run again in m minutes Time, if changed.

Parameters.Name: RunHours
Parameters.Description:
24hr Format hhmm-hhmm 
Run Hours - times when new copies may be started.

Parameters.Name: PerFilePass
Parameters.Description: check run hours on a Per File (not per pass) basis.

Parameters.Name: InterPacketGap
Parameters.Description: Inter-Packet Gap (ms), to free bandwidth on slow lines.

Parameters.Name: copyJunctions
Parameters.Description: copy Junctions as junctions instead of as the junction targets.

Parameters.Name: copySymbolicLinks
Parameters.Description: copy Symbolic Links as links instead of as the link targets.

Parameters.Name: MultiThread
Parameters.Description:
Do multi-threaded copies with n threads (default 8). 
n must be at least 1 and not greater than 128. 
This option is incompatible with the /IPG and /EFSRAW options. 
Redirect output using /LOG option for better performance.

Parameters.Name: dCopyFlags
Parameters.Description:
what to COPY for directories (default is /DCOPY:DA). 
(copyflags : D=Data, A=Attributes, T=Timestamps, E=EAs, X=Skip alt data streams).

Parameters.Name: dNoCopy
Parameters.Description: COPY NO directory info (by default /DCOPY:DA is done).

Parameters.Name: NoOffload
Parameters.Description: copy files without using the Windows Copy Offload mechanism.

Parameters.Name: Compress
Parameters.Description: Request network compression during file transfer, if applicable.

Parameters.Name: IoMaxSize
Parameters.Description:
Format n[KMG] 
Requested max i/o size per {read,write} cycle, in n [KMG] bytes.

Parameters.Name: IoRate
Parameters.Description:
Format n[KMG] 
Requested i/o rate, in n [KMG] bytes per second.

Parameters.Name: Threshold
Parameters.Description:
Format n[KMG] 
File size threshold for throttling, in n [KMG] bytes (see Remarks).

Parameters.Name: Threshold
Parameters.Description:
Format n[KMG] 
File size threshold for throttling, in n [KMG] bytes (see Remarks).

Parameters.Name: ArchiveOnly
Parameters.Description: copy only files with the Archive attribute set.

Parameters.Name: ArchiveOnlyReset
Parameters.Description: copy only files with the Archive attribute and reset it.

Parameters.Name: IncludeAttributes
Parameters.Description:
Includes only files for which any of the specified attributes are set. The valid values for this option are: 
R - Read only 
A - Archive 
S - System 
H - Hidden 
C - Compressed 
N - Not content indexed 
E - Encrypted 
T - Temporary 
O - Offline

Parameters.Name: ExcludeAttributes
Parameters.Description:
Excludes files for which any of the specified attributes are set. The valid values for this option are: 
R - Read only 
A - Archive 
S - System 
H - Hidden 
C - Compressed 
N - Not content indexed 
E - Encrypted 
T - Temporary 
O - Offline

Parameters.Name: ExcludeFileName
Parameters.Description: eXclude Files matching given names/paths/wildcards.

Parameters.Name: ExcludeDirName
Parameters.Description: eXclude Directories matching given names/paths.

Parameters.Name: ExcludeChanged
Parameters.Description: eXclude Changed files.

Parameters.Name: ExcludeNewer
Parameters.Description: eXclude Newer files.

Parameters.Name: ExcludeOlder
Parameters.Description: eXclude Older files.

Parameters.Name: ExcludeExtra
Parameters.Description:
eXclude eXtra files and directories. 
An
file is present in destination but not source; excluding extras will prevent any deletions from the destination.

Parameters.Name: ExcludeLonely
Parameters.Description:
eXclude Lonely files and directories. 
A
file is present in source but not destination; excluding lonely will prevent any new files being added to the destination.

Parameters.Name: IncludeSame
Parameters.Description: Include Same files.

Parameters.Name: IncludeTweaked
Parameters.Description:
Include Tweaked files. 
A Tweaked file is defined to be one that exists in both the source and destination, with identical size and timestamp, but different attribute settings.
